data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Ngarchelong.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ngarchelong, Palau

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Ngarchelong who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Ngarchelong.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 88 believers in Ngarchelong, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Mengellang
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Mengellang, Ngarchelong, Palau.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Ngarchelong who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 294 cultural Christians in the state of Ngarchelong to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.section_summary:
the state of Ngarchelong, Palau has a population of 400.

We estimate Ngarchelong has 88 people who might know Jesus, 294 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Ngarchelong. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.
